methods.name: createListing
methods.desc: Creates a listing in the directory by vouching for an NFD root or segment of directory.algo.

args.name: collateralPayment
args.desc: The Algo payment of collateral to vouch for the listing

args.name: nfdAppID
args.desc: The uint64 application ID of the NFD that will be listed

methods.name: refreshListing
methods.desc: Refreshes a listing in the directory and updates its last touched timestamp.

args.name: nfdAppID
args.desc: The uint64 application ID of the NFD that will be refreshed

methods.name: abandonListing
methods.desc: Abandons a listing in the directory and returns the vouched collateral.

args.name: nfdAppID
args.desc: The uint64 application ID of the NFD that will be abandoned

methods.name: deleteListing
methods.desc: Deletes a listing from the directory & sends the collateral to the fee sink.

args.name: nfdAppID
args.desc: The uint64 application ID of the NFD that will be deleted
